      SearchQuery setGeoCode(GeoCode geo)
      Sets the geo code for the query, allowing you to find tweets composed near a location in the world or composed by people that live near a location in the world.
      SearchQuery setLang(java.lang.String lang)
      Sets the locale code of tweets to attempt to limit the search to (e.g., "en" for English).
      SearchQuery setResultType(SearchQuery.ResultType type)
      Sets the result type of the query, allowing you to get popular and/or recent tweets.

        public SearchQuery setGeoCode(GeoCode geo)
